AZ Central reported,
Arizona House Speaker Rusty Bowers filed paperwork to run for the state Senate on Friday, setting up what may be an epic primary battle that highlights Republican divisions overthe 2020 presidential election results.
Arizona House Speaker Rusty Bowers, one of the key RINOS in Arizona stonewalling decertification of the fraudulent 2020 election, filed to run for an Arizona State Senate seat last week.
Arizona State Representative Mark Finchem recently presented a resolution to decertify the fraudulent election results, but Rusty Bowers lacks the courage to fight for Arizona voters.
Since November 3rd, Bowers has sided with Democrats on election integrity despite massive findings of law violations and illegal ballots from the Maricopa County audit.
The Gateway Pundit reported on Bowers’ opposition to critical election integrity bills and his plans to kill Representative Finchem’s resolution to decertify Arizona.
